trans-unit.source: Uninstall-Module
trans-unit.target: Uninstall-Module

trans-unit.source: Uninstalls a module which was installed using PowerShellGet cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: Uninstalls a module which was installed using PowerShellGet cmdlets.

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: The Uninstall-Module cmdlet uninstalls the specified module from the local computer.
trans-unit.target: The Uninstall-Module cmdlet uninstalls the specified module from the local computer.

trans-unit.source: You cannot uninstall a module if some other modules have a dependency on it.
trans-unit.target: You cannot uninstall a module if some other modules have a dependency on it.

trans-unit.source: The Uninstall-Module cmdlets also validates if the module being uninstalled is in-use or not.
trans-unit.target: The Uninstall-Module cmdlets also validates if the module being uninstalled is in-use or not.

trans-unit.source: An error will be thrown if the module is in use.
trans-unit.target: An error will be thrown if the module is in use.

trans-unit.source: Cmdlet syntax
trans-unit.target: Cmdlet syntax

trans-unit.source: Cmdlet online help reference
trans-unit.target: Cmdlet online help reference

trans-unit.source: [Uninstall-Module](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=526864)
trans-unit.target: [Uninstall-Module](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=526864)

trans-unit.source: Example commands
trans-unit.target: Example commands

trans-unit.source: Run the Uninstall-Module cmdlet to uninstall a module that you installed by using PowerShellGet.
trans-unit.target: Run the Uninstall-Module cmdlet to uninstall a module that you installed by using PowerShellGet.

trans-unit.source: If any other module depends on the module that you want to delete, PowerShellGet throws an error.
trans-unit.target: If any other module depends on the module that you want to delete, PowerShellGet throws an error.

trans-unit.source: Uninstalling a module when some other modules have a dependency on it.
trans-unit.target: Uninstalling a module when some other modules have a dependency on it.

trans-unit.source: You can override this by specify -Force option on Uninstall-Module cmdlet
trans-unit.target: You can override this by specify -Force option on Uninstall-Module cmdlet

trans-unit.source: **NOTE:** This is not a recommended practice.
trans-unit.target: **NOTE:** This is not a recommended practice.

trans-unit.source: Other modules will break with this action.
trans-unit.target: Other modules will break with this action.

trans-unit.source: Uninstall a module which is already in use
trans-unit.target: Uninstall a module which is already in use

trans-unit.source: Uninstall SnippetPx fails due to the dependent module
trans-unit.target: Uninstall SnippetPx fails due to the dependent module

trans-unit.source: Uninstall TypePx then uninstall the SnippetPx
trans-unit.target: Uninstall TypePx then uninstall the SnippetPx

trans-unit.source: For a module name which is not installed using PowerShellGet cmdlets
trans-unit.target: For a module name which is not installed using PowerShellGet cmdlets
